mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posting( email, posting_title, posting_content ) VALUES ( #{user.email}, #{postingTitle}, #{postingContent} )
INSERT INTO location( posting_no, location_name, latitude, longitude ) VALUES ( #{postingNo}, #{locationName}, #{locationLatitude}, #{locationLongitude} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.posting_no, p.email, p.posting_title, p.posting_content, p.reg_date, p.update_date, u.nickname, l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude, tw.tag_name, tw.tag_no FROM posting p LEFT OUTER JOIN location l ON p.posting_no = l.posting_no LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON p.email = u.email LEFT OUTER JOIN () tw ON p.posting_no = tw.target_no WHERE p.posting_no = #{postingNo} AND p.active = 1

SELECT p.posting_no, p.email, u.nickname, p.posting_title, p.posting_content, p.reg_date, p.update_date, tw.tag_name, tw.tag_no, vc.count FROM posting p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.email = u.email LEFT OUTER JOIN () tw ON p.posting_no = tw.target_no LEFT OUTER JOIN () vc ON p.posting_no = vc.target_no
p.active = 1
AND p.email = #{keyword}
ORDER BY
vc.count DESC,
p.posting_no DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE posting
posting_title = #{postingTitle},
posting_content = #{postingContent},
update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE posting_no = #{postingNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT tg.tag_group_no, tg.tag_no, t.tag_name, tg.target_no FROM tag_group tg, tag t WHERE tg.tag_no = t.tag_no AND tg.category_no = 5
SELECT count(*) count, target_no FROM log WHERE category_no = 5 AND behavior = 1 GROUP BY target_no
